message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $8500?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and uniqueness.
